title: requestScanMission
description: Request for Observation Mission done by camera sensors

droneId.description: The selected drone ID to perform the task

scanAngle.description: Azimuth of scan pattern (refferenced to true north), default is 90deg

status.description:
The request ststus that will enable all system participients to manage an operational process -
Pending - after the request was sent to the responsible service responded by Succes response
InProgress - When the responsible service started to take care of the Request
Cancelled - When the Request will not be handled any more
Completed - When the Request was finished
